--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::The Destrocons:::
> 
> ::they land near where Cygnar and Cyanide are standing::
> Ramjet: Hey, we got here first. And we've been planning this for 
even longer. 
> The Trainers belong to the Destrons.
> ::he looks to Cygnar::
> Ramjet: What should we do?

As the Destrocons land near Cyanide, the Violator drops in altitude 
and reactivates its shields, hving lowered them when Skywarp had 
taken the scorpion tank. The ship then flys above the Destrocons and 
3 laser cannons lock onto each of them. Inside the ship the floor 
opens and Gemini 1 and two step out and hover in the air between the 
shield and the ship. The scorpion tank then aims at the Destrocons 
with all of its weapons.

Skywarp: "These "trainers" belong to us. Get in our way and you die."
